    • CreatePm

      @Test void CreatePm()
      Tests the methods addPlayer, tries to add a new player when there's no space left and to add a player with an existing nickname

    • playersManagerTest

      @Test void playersManagerTest()
      Checks the correct implementation of nextPlayer and getPlayer by cycling on the players order

    • SortingTest

      @Test void SortingTest()
      Tests the right implementation of calculatePlayerOrder assign a new played card to each player. A limit case is when we have more player playing the same card

      @Test void clockwiseTest()
      Tests the right implementation of clockWiseOrder assign a new played card to each player.
